about_the_game:
The Mystic Vale Season Pass includes three expansions for the base game. Each expansion is true to its physical counterpart in content and design.

All content for the Mystic Vale Season Pass is now available instantly, all expansions for Mystic Vale are also available separately.


Introducing 54 new Advancements and 18 new Vale Cards to the pool, Vale of Magic expands the Mystic Vale base game. The expansion offers new combination options and strategic choices adding extra depth to your gameplay.



Vale of the Wild introduces another 54 Advancement Cards and 18 Vale Cards, as well as two new mechanics to the game.
This expansion brings you Leaders, strong druids who have come together to lead their clan to victory in the battle to save the Valley of Life. Within Vale of the Wild, you’ll discover 8 of these Leaders ready to assist you by granting special abilities that can be upgraded to become even more powerful.

Along with the Leaders, Vale of the Wild also introduces Eclipse Cards. These special advancements can be found among the new Advancement Cards you’ll receive. Eclipse Cards have the possibility to be stacked on the same space as an advancement already on your card creating even more powerful combos.




Mana storm brings another 48 Advancement Cards, 18 Vale Cards, and 8 new Leaders. The expansion also introduces a new mechanic in the form of amulets. These 8 Amulets work in the same was as your mana token, being flipped if you spoil, offering unique effects and a greater variety over the regular mana token. Players will also find that these new cards and amulets may contain negative Victory Points, making your battle even more of a struggle.
